title: Xiaomiâ€™s next flagship could feature Leica-branded cameras
content:
When it comes to Leica-branded smartphone cameras, only one name comes to mind — Huawei. But now that Huawei is just a shadow of its former self, a new contender is planning to launch a phone with Leica-branded cameras. Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi is reportedly working on a smartphone with Leica-branded cameras, and XDA Senior

The post Xiaomi’s next flagship could feature Leica-branded cameras appeared first on xda-developers.
description: New strings spotted in the Chinese version of the MIUI Gallery Editor reveal that Xiaomi could partner with Leica on its next flagship.
